titles.title: I Am Coming to the Cross

verse.name: v1
c
verse.lines: I am trusting, Lord, in Thee. Blessèd Lamb of Calvary; Humbly at Thy cross I bow. Save me, Jesus, save me now.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: Here I give my all to Thee:,-- Friends and time and earthly store; Soul and body Thine to be,-- Wholly Thine forevermore.

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: Jesus comes! He fills my soul! Perfected in Him I am; I am ev'ry whit made whole: Glory, glory to the Lamb!
